fields.description: AWS sets to the latest one by default.
fields.summary: ELB should have the latest SSL security policy set to the https/ssl listeners

comments.body: -[~tony]: Heads up that this ticket is blocking GUI-1621-
[~kgill] I don't think it does. The implementation is done and this ticket is about adding the latest policy definition that AWS recently updated (so it's about adding another static JSON file).

To test, create a new loadbalancer or the listener with https/ssl front-end. 
Then make sure the created listener has the security policy (currently 	ELBSecurityPolicy-2015-05) attached by default. 

To test with EUCA-10989, add a new policy file under /etc/eucalyptus/cloud.d/elb-security-policy (by copying the existing one and changing PolicyName attribute). The PolicyName should end with the later date than the currently latest (e.g.,ELBSecurityPolicy-2015-06).

Re-start CLC and create a new listener. The new listener should have the above custom policy.

This change breaks the build due to changes in the installation footprint that are not associated with any package:

{code}
error: Installed (but unpackaged) file(s) found:
   /etc/eucalyptus/cloud.d/elb-security-policy/elb_security_policy_2011_08.json
   /etc/eucalyptus/cloud.d/elb-security-policy/elb_security_policy_2014_01.json
   /etc/eucalyptus/cloud.d/elb-security-policy/elb_security_policy_2014_10.json
   /etc/eucalyptus/cloud.d/elb-security-policy/elb_security_policy_2015_02.json
   /etc/eucalyptus/cloud.d/elb-security-policy/elb_security_policy_2015_05.json
{code}

What package should these files be assigned to?

Issue resolved.

Version of Eucalyptus 4.2: {{commit df0474353ae59acb5df23c616f1458c014b2eaab}}

*Steps*

# Set up Eucalyptus 4.2 cloud from source - [hspencer-1307|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Master/1307/]
# Sourced 'eucalyptus/admin' credentials
# Created account 'devops', and downloaded credentials:
{code}
[root@c-02 ~]# euare-accountcreate -a devops
devops	000584109814
[root@c-02 ~]# euca-get-credentials -a devops -u admin devops-admin.zip
warning: euca-get-credentials is deprecated; use ``eval `clcadmin-assume-system-credentials`'' or ``euare-useraddkey'' instead
{code}
# As 'eucalyptus/admin' user, listed ELB policies:
{code}
[root@c-02 ~]# eulb-describe-lb-policies
POLICY	ELBSample-AppCookieStickinessPolicy	AppCookieStickinessPolicyType
POLICY	ELBSample-LBCookieStickinessPolicy	LBCookieStickinessPolicyType
POLICY	ELBSecurityPolicy-2014-01	SSLNegotiationPolicyType
POLICY	ELBSecurityPolicy-2015-05	SSLNegotiationPolicyType
POLICY	ELBSecurityPolicy-2015-02	SSLNegotiationPolicyType
POLICY	ELBSecurityPolicy-2014-10	SSLNegotiationPolicyType
POLICY	ELBSecurityPolicy-2011-08	SSLNegotiationPolicyType

[root@c-02 ~]# eulb-describe-lb-policies --show-long -p ELBSecurityPolicy-2014-01,ELBSecurityPolicy-2015-05,ELBSecurityPolicy-2015-02,ELBSecurityPolicy-2014-10,ELBSecurityPolicy-2011-08
POLICY	ELBSample-AppCookieStickinessPolicy	AppCookieStickinessPolicyType	{name=CookieName,value=ELBSampleCookie}
POLICY	ELBSample-LBCookieStickinessPolicy	LBCookieStickinessPolicyType	{name=CookieExpirationPeriod,value=100}
